songs.title: Reggae Irie
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Let's go and dance
And don't watch TV
I want a new
And don't watch TV
I want a change
Your matter to live
I want you listen
You shouting Irie

[Pre-Chorus]
Together with you every night
And breaking with the routine, baby
Come and dance
And don't watch TV
I want a beat
I want a beat

[Chorus]
Together night (woy yo yo yo)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)

[Verse 2]
Ok, baby
So kiss me tonight
I don't want to continue this fight
So let's started
Doing it sweet
What do you want?
Are you playing with me?

[Pre-Chorus]
Together with you every night
And breaking with the routine, baby
Come and dance
And don't watch TV
I want a beat
I want a beat

[Chorus]
Together night (woy yo yo yo)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)

Say, together night (woy yo yo yo)

[Instrumental Break]

[Verse 2]
Ok, baby
So kiss me tonight
I don't want to continue this fight
So let's started
Doing it sweet
What do you want?
Are you playing with me?

[Pre-Chorus]
Together with you every night
And breaking with the routine, baby
Come and dance
And don't watch TV
I want a beat
I want a beat

[Chorus]
Together night (woy yo yo yo)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie
Reggae an' reggae an' reggae Irie (listen)
